product_description: This intensive hydration hair masque infuses hair with a powerful dose of moisture and nutrients. This deep conditioning hair treatment masque is made with Shea Butter, and Mafura and Baobab Oils that are blended with antioxidant-rich African Rock Fig to restore and lock in moisture while deeply conditioning. Smoothes and fortifies follicles for stronger, healthier, frizz-free hair. This hair masque blends certified organic Shea Butter, Honey, and Mafura and Baobab Oils with antioxidant-rich African Rock Fig to restore and lock in moisture. As is the case with all SheaMoisture hair products, this intensive hydration hair masque is formulated with no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no mineral oil, no animal testing, and no petrolatum. To use: Section clean, wet hair. Apply this deep conditioner generously. Use a wide tooth comb to distribute this hair product evenly from root to ends. Leave in for 5 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. For extra conditioning, cover hair with a plastic cap. Apply moderate heat for up to 30 minutes. When using a steamer, do not cover hair. Moist heat will add to the masque's hydration. Our Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase, you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

product_description: Feel fearless. Feel reborn. Feel free to live beautifully, every day, no matter how you style your hair. Now every time you color, bleach, straighten or blow-dry your hair, Dove Intensive Repair Advanced Damage Therapy 10-in-1 Serum hair mask will renew it with every wash-hair is reborn from 10 signs of damage in 1 minute. breakage, 3-step system vs. non-conditioning shampoo This Dove hair mask is the third step in our 4-step Intensive Repair regimen. Shampoo to restore hair, Dove Conditioner to repair hair; a weekly Mask for hair renewal and a hair serum to re-shield and style. Enriched with Glutamic Amino Serum, a key amino acid found in hair, this hair mask for damaged hair deeply nourishes and strengthens the hair’s structure. So there is no need to stress about damage, and you can feel good about your new look and new you. That’s why our Intensive Repair range with Bio-Protein Care technology is designed to regenerate hair strength and refill it with 1 trillion strength protein builders with every wash. This hair repair breakthrough is backed by 10 years of research, to help stop 98% of visible hair damage Dove Intensive Repair deep conditioning hair mask has 10 transformative benefits in just 1 minute! It repairs hair at molecular level; protects from future damage; there’s less visible breakage; restores strength; reduces split ends; delivers long-lasting smoothness; boosts shine; seals hair cuticles; leaves hair touchably soft; and allows easy styling. Dove Intensive Repair hair products are ideal for damaged hair that needs extra care. Just apply this hair mask for dry, damaged hair generously after using the Dove Shampoo and hair conditioner. Let the rich formula work for 1 minute, then rinse. Use once a week or more if your hair needs more nourishment. This is also a great hair mask for chemically processed hair or a rich hair mask for color treated hair. As always, Dove hair products are vegan & PETA approved, meaning it’s not tested on animals globally.

This ultra-reparative hair mask helps control frizz, breakage and split ends. How It Works This bonding complex penetrates to the hair’s cortex, helping to support the keratin structure and reinforce damaged hair bonds.
